statements: SELECT conversation_id, user_id, bot_id, message, timestamp FROM chatbot_conversations;
SELECT user_id, bot_id, conversation_id, timestamp, message FROM chatbot_conversations;
SELECT bot_id, message, user_id, conversation_id, timestamp FROM chatbot_conversations;
SELECT timestamp, conversation_id, message, user_id, bot_id FROM chatbot_conversations;
SELECT * FROM chatbot_conversations;
SELECT * FROM chatbot_conversations WHERE user_id = '1' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT conversation_id, message FROM chatbot_conversations WHERE bot_id = '2';
SELECT conversation_id, message, timestamp FROM chatbot_conversations WHERE bot_id = '3' AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM chatbot_conversations WHERE bot_id = '4' OR bot_id = '5' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT conversation_id, user_id, bot_id FROM chatbot_conversations WHERE user_id = '6' OR bot_id = '7';
SELECT * FROM conversation_logs;
SELECT user_id, message FROM conversation_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT username, profile_pic_url FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 101;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, message FROM conversation_logs WHERE user_id = 105 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE profile_pic_url IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM conversation_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT message, timestamp FROM conversation_logs WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, count(log_id) AS log_count FROM conversation_logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING count(log_id) > 5;
SELECT user_id, username, profile_pic_url FROM user_profiles WHERE profile_pic_url IS NOT NULL;
SELECT log_id, user_id, timestamp, message FROM conversation_logs WHERE message LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM conversations WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT message, timestamp FROM conversations WHERE chatbot_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM conversations GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM chatbots WHERE creator = 'John Doe';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM conversations WHERE user_id = 1 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(conversation_id) FROM conversations GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(conversation_id) > 10;
SELECT c.message, u.first_name, u.last_name FROM conversations c JOIN users u ON c.user_id = u.user_id;

SELECT c.message, c.timestamp, u.first_name, u.last_name, b.name FROM conversations c JOIN users u ON c.user_id = u.user_id JOIN chatbots b ON c.chatbot_id = b.chatbot_id WHERE c.message LIKE '%important%';
SELECT u.first_name, u.last_name, COUNT(c.chatbot_id) AS total_chats FROM users u LEFT JOIN conversations c ON u.user_id = c.user_id GROUP BY u.user_id ORDER BY total_chats DESC;
SELECT * FROM conversation_logs;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT bot_id, name, created_at FROM bots ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT message, timestamp FROM bot_logs WHERE bot_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440001' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT conversation_id, user_id, bot_id, message, timestamp FROM conversation_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND message LIKE '%hello%' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM conversation_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT message, timestamp FROM conversation_logs WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT bot_id, COUNT(*) AS message_count FROM conversation_logs GROUP BY bot_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY message_count DESC;
SELECT c.message, b.name FROM conversation_logs c INNER JOIN bots b ON c.bot_id = b.bot_id WHERE c.timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT u.username, c.message, b.description FROM users u INNER JOIN conversation_logs c ON c.user_id = u.user_id INNER JOIN bots b ON c.bot_id = b.bot_id ORDER BY c.timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM conversation_logs;
SELECT user_id, message FROM conversation_logs WHERE log_id = 1;
SELECT bot_name, creator_name FROM bots WHERE bot_id = 2;
SELECT user_name, registration_date FROM users ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT bot_name, creator_email FROM bots WHERE bot_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM conversation_logs WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, registration_date FROM users WHERE user_id > 10 ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT bot_name, creator_name, creator_email FROM bots WHERE bot_id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT log_id, user_id, bot_id, timestamp FROM interactions WHERE bot_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT message_id, message_text FROM messages WHERE message_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
